Brief:

TV-Browser Internet is a streamlined web browser crafted explicitly for a seamless browsing experience on your television. Bringing the vast world of the internet to your living room, this app is tailored to cater to users' needs for larger screen interactions with an interface that's compatible with TV remotes.
